parameters.functionScript:
const selectedItems = Inputs.selectedItems
if (selectedItems?.length) {
    Outputs.length = selectedItems?.length
    Outputs.disabled = selectedItems.length === 0
    Outputs.activateDisabled = selectedItems
        .filter(i => ['locked', 'created'].includes(i.company.states.flow.value))
        .length === 0
    Outputs.lockDisabled = selectedItems
        .filter(i => ['activated'].includes(i.company.states.flow.value))
        .length === 0
} else {
    Outputs.length = 0
    Outputs.activateDisabled = true
    Outputs.lockDisabled = true
}

const { hasLength, isNotEmpty, isEmail, matches } = FormValidators

Outputs.formScheme = {
    initialValues: {
        companyName: '',
        companyPhone: '',
        companyEmail: '',
        firstName: '',
        lastName: '',
        userName: '',
        password: '',
        legalName: '',
        legalAddress: '',
        legalRs: '',
        legalInn: '',
        legalOgrn: '',
        legalBik: '',
        legalKs: '',
    },
    validate: {
        companyName: hasLength({ min: 2, max: 30 }),
        companyPhone: hasLength({ min: 11, max: 11 }),
        companyEmail: isEmail('Не верный формат почты'),
        firstName: hasLength({ min: 2, max: 30 }),
        lastName: hasLength({ min: 2, max: 30 }),
        userName: (value) => (
            value.length < 3
                ? true
                : Inputs.managers?.filter(i => i.id !== Inputs.selectedManager?.id)
                    .find(i => i.user.name === value)
                    ? 'Учетная запись с таким логином уже существует'
                    : null
        ),
        password: hasLength({ min: 2, max: 30 }),
        legalName: hasLength({ min: 6, max: 64 }),
        legalAddress: hasLength({ min: 6, max: 256 }),
        legalRs: hasLength({ min: 20, max: 20 }),
        legalInn: hasLength({ min: 10, max: 12 }),
        legalOgrn: hasLength({ min: 13, max: 15 }),
        legalBik: hasLength({ min: 9, max: 9 }),
        legalKs: hasLength({ min: 20, max: 20 }),
    },
    validateInputOnChange: true
}

parameters.functionScript:
const updateFormScheme = Clone(Inputs.formScheme)
const selectedManager = Inputs.selectedManager

if (selectedManager) {
    updateFormScheme.initialValues = {
        companyName: selectedManager?.company.content?.name,
        companyPhone: selectedManager?.company.content?.contacts.phone,
        companyEmail: selectedManager.company.content?.contacts.email,
        firstName: selectedManager.content?.firstName,
        lastName: selectedManager.content?.lastName,
        userName: selectedManager.user?.credentials.local.username,
        password: selectedManager.user?.credentials.local.notSecret,
        legalName: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.name,
        legalAddress: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.address,
        legalRs: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.rs,
        legalInn: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.inn,
        legalOgrn: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.ogrn,
        legalBik: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.bik,
        legalKs: selectedManager.company?.content.legal.ks,
    }

    Outputs.drawerTitle = selectedManager?.company.content.name
    Outputs.updateFormScheme = updateFormScheme
}

const actionName = Inputs.actionName

if (actionName === 'editCompany') Outputs.selectedManager = Inputs.actionItem
else Outputs.selectedManager = Inputs.selectedItem

const selectedManager = Inputs.selectedManager

if (selectedManager) {
    Outputs.drawerTitle = selectedManager?.company.content.name
    Outputs.companyPhone = selectedManager?.company.content?.contacts.phone
    Outputs.companyEmail = selectedManager.company.content?.contacts.email
    Outputs.name = Mustache.render(
        '{{firstName}} {{lastName}}', selectedManager.content)
    Outputs.userName = selectedManager.user?.credentials.local.username
    Outputs.password = selectedManager.user?.credentials.local.notSecret
    Outputs.legalName = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.name
    Outputs.legalAddress = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.address
    Outputs.legalRs = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.rs
    Outputs.legalInn = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.inn
    Outputs.legalOgrn = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.ogrn
    Outputs.legalBik = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.bik
    Outputs.legalKs = selectedManager.company?.content.legal.ks
}

const formHook = Inputs.formHook
const workers = Inputs.workers
const updateWorker = Inputs.updateWorker

if (workers
    ?.filter(i => i.id !== updateWorker?.id)
    .find(i => i.user.name === formHook?.values.userName)
) formHook.errors.userName = 'Учетная запись с таким логином уже существует'

parameters.inputItems:
[
    { value: 'date', label: 'День' },
    { value: 'week', label: 'Неделя' },
    { value: 'month', label: 'Месяц' },
]

parameters.code:
const cap = s => s && s[0].toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)
let startDate = Dayjs().startOf('day'), endDate = {}, dateString = ''

Script.Signals.Init = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = Dayjs().startOf('day')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('day')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'week':
            startDate = startDate.startOf('week')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('week')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM') + ' - '
                + endDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'month':
            startDate = startDate.startOf('month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

Script.Signals.Prev = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'day')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('day')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'week':
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'week')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('week')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM') + ' - '
                + endDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'month':
            startDate = startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
    }    
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}
Script.Signals.Next = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'day')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('day')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'week':
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'week')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('week')
            dateString = startDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM') + ' - '
                + endDate.locale('ru').format('D MMMM')
            break
        case 'month':
            startDate = startDate = startDate.add(1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
    } 
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

parameters.code:
const cap = s => s && s[0].toUpperCase() + s.slice(1)
let startDate = Dayjs().startOf('month'), endDate = {}, dateString = ''

Script.Signals.Init = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = Dayjs().startOf('month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

Script.Signals.Prev = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            startDate = startDate.add(-1, 'year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}
Script.Signals.Next = () => {
    const dateRangeSelector = Script.Inputs.dateRangeSelector || 'date'
    switch (dateRangeSelector) {
        case 'date':
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'month')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('month')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('MMMM YYYY'))
            break
        default:
            startDate = startDate.startOf('year')
            startDate = startDate.add(1, 'year')
            endDate = startDate.endOf('year')
            dateString = cap(startDate.locale('ru').format('YYYY'))
    }
    Script.Outputs.startDate = startDate
    Script.Outputs.endDate = endDate
    Script.Outputs.dateString = dateString
}

parameters.functionScript:
const task = Inputs.task

if (task) {
    Outputs.taskName = task.content.name
    Outputs.complexName = task.complex.content.name
    Outputs.houseName = task.house.content.name
    Outputs.areaName = task.area.content.name
    Outputs.resultsDisabled = task.content.results?.images ? false : true

    const startDatePlanValue = task.content.schedule.startDate.plan
    Outputs.startDatePlan = Dayjs(startDatePlanValue).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
    const startDateFactValue = task.content.schedule.startDate.fact
    if (startDateFactValue) {
        Outputs.startDateFact = startDateFactValue
            ? Dayjs(startDateFactValue).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
            : ''
        const dateDiffValue = Dayjs(startDatePlanValue).diff(Dayjs(startDateFactValue), 'm')
        Outputs.dateDiff = Dayjs.duration(Math.abs(dateDiffValue), 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
    } else {
        Outputs.startDateFact = ''
        Outputs.dateDiff = ''
    }

    const durationPlanValue = task.content.schedule.duration.plan
    Outputs.durationPlan = Dayjs.duration(Dayjs(durationPlanValue), 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
    const durationFactValue = task.content.schedule.duration.fact
    if (durationFactValue) {
        Outputs.durationFact = Dayjs.duration(Dayjs(durationFactValue), 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
        const durationDiff = durationPlanValue - durationFactValue
        let diffFormat = Dayjs.duration(Math.abs(durationDiff), 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
        if (durationDiff < 0) diffFormat = `-${diffFormat}`
        Outputs.durationDiff = diffFormat
    } else {
        Outputs.durationFact = ''
        Outputs.durationDiff = ''
    }

    Outputs.openTime = Dayjs.duration(task.content.schedule.openTime, 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
    Outputs.liveTime = Dayjs.duration(task.content.schedule.liveTime, 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
    Outputs.scheduleType = task.content.schedule.type
    Outputs.weekdaysMounted = task.content.schedule.type === 'multiple'
    Outputs.weekdays = task.content.schedule.weekdays
    Outputs.workerItems = [task.worker]
    Outputs.worker = task.worker
}

parameters.functionScript:
const tasks = Inputs.tasks
const foundedData = Inputs.foundedData
const searchString = Inputs.searchString
let resultTasks = []

if (searchString?.length > 0) resultTasks = foundedData?.task
    ?.filter(i => tasks.map(i => i.id).includes(i.id)) || []
else resultTasks = tasks

Outputs.tasks = resultTasks
Outputs.noDataMounted = resultTasks?.length === 0
Outputs.drawerTitle = `Фильтры (выбрано ${Inputs.filtersCount || 0})`

const taskId = Inputs.taskId
const content = Inputs.content
const state = Inputs.states?.flow

Outputs.taskName = Mustache.render('{{content.name}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskState = Mustache.render('{{states.flow.title}}', Noodl.Objects[taskId])
Outputs.taskStateColor = Noodl.Objects.Consts.taskStateColorMap[state.value]
Outputs.startDate = Dayjs(content.schedule.startDate.plan).format('YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm')
Outputs.durationPlan = Dayjs.duration(content.schedule.duration.plan, 'm').format('H[ч] m[м]')
Outputs.string = Inputs.content && Mustache.render('{{{name}}}', Inputs.content)
Outputs.string = Inputs.content && Mustache.render('{{{name}}}', Inputs.content)

const taskId = Inputs.taskId
const task = Noodl.Objects[Inputs.taskId]
const content = Inputs.content
const state = Inputs.states?.flow

Outputs.taskName = Mustache.render('{{content.name}}', task)
Outputs.activateMounted = task.states.flow.value === 'planned'
Outputs.finishMounted = task.states.flow.value === 'active'
Outputs.resultIds = task.result.map(r => r.id)
Outputs.taskStateValue = task.states.flow.value
